page_content: The page discusses a police operation following property damage in Biel.
The page provides information on the official value of property with a right of residence.
The page informs about traffic disruptions due to a sports event in Langnau i. E. and surrounding areas.
The page discusses measures taken by the Veterinary Service of the Canton of Bern to combat foot-and-mouth disease.
The page discusses a survey conducted on the performance of the tax administration of the Canton of Bern.
